explains: v. 对……估计过高（overrate 的过去分词）

sentences.en: Life in the wild is vastly overrated.
sentences.cn: 野外生活被大大地高估了。

sentences.en: He had not at all overrated Veronica's desirability.
sentences.cn: 他丝毫没有高估韦罗妮卡的性感。

sentences.en: In my opinion, Hirst's work has been vastly overrated.
sentences.cn: 依我看赫斯特的作品被大大地高估了。
